attributes.action: Separate care for women suffering from a miscarriage
attributes.additional_details: Women suffering from miscarriages are treat alongside women with ongoing pregnancies , Having to sit in the same waiting rooms as women and couples who's pregnancy is going successful and having to be treat on the same wards. A change is needed for this because if it isn't heartbreaking enough finding you have miscarried having to sit alongside women who get to look forward to meeting their baby makes it a lot harder to deal with. There should be at least a separate department.
